item.description:
Not Your Average Joe's, located at the Cape Cod Mall, offers what's called:

"Full portion, half-price from 3-6 P.M."(See Menu below)

Appetizers

buffalo-caribbean chicken tenders 4.50

pan-seared crab cakes 4.99

smoked mozzarella and ricotta fritters 3.99

skewered and grilled chicken satay 4.50

chilled vegetable spring rolls 3.99

forno baked chicken quesadilla 4.50

golden-fried coconut shrimp 4.99

four cheese spinach and artichoke dip 3.99

crispy asian chicken rolls 4.50

seared ahi tuna wontons 5.25

pizzasâ€¦appetizer sized

cheese 2.99

margherita 3.50

barbequed chicken 3.50

california bacon blue 3.50

Meet me in the bar/lounge at Not Your Average Joe's for drinks and lite bites/appetizers or if you prefer order a meal! Whatever your preference! The Movie to follow is at Regal Cape Cod Mall Stadium 12, 793 Route 132, Hyannis.

Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief: 6:50 p.m. Running Time: 120 minutes

It's the 21st century, but the gods of Mount Olympus and assorted monsters have walked out of the pages of high school student Percy Jackson's Greek mythology texts and into his life. And they're not happy: Zeus' lightning bolt has been stolen, and Percy is the prime suspect. Even more troubling is the sudden disappearance of Percy's mother. As Percy adapts to his newly discovered status as a demi-god (his father is Poseidon), he finds himself caught between the battling titans of Mt. Olympus. He and his friends embark on a cross-country adventure to catch the true lightning thief, save Percy's mom, and unravel a mystery more powerful than the gods themselves.

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Lite Bites at Not Your Average Joes with Movie to Follow!
